Smart Keychain: A keychain that can track the location of your keys and other items, and send notifications to your phone if they are misplaced.
Keychain with built-in flashlight: A keychain that has a built-in flashlight, making it for finding things in the dark or unlocking your door.
Keychain with a built-in wireless charging pad: A keychain that has a built-in wireless charging pad, allowing you to charge your phone on the go.
Keychain with a built-in portable speaker: A keychain that has a built-in portable speaker, allowing you to listen to music or take calls on the go.
Keychain with a built-in USB drive: A keychain that has a built-in USB drive, allowing you to carry important files or documents with you wherever you go.
